title: Mineral Resources
additional-notes: This is an Australian publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding a volume is in the public domain, search for renewals for a volume under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked volume titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Pete Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
